str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

word: we were also chosen as God’s own,
parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To cast lots, choose by lot, assign by lot, assign a portion, receive a share. From kleros; to allot, i.e. to assign.

str2: To foreordain, predetermine, mark out beforehand. From pro and horizo; to limit in advance, i.e. predetermine.

From protithemai; a setting forth, i.e. proposal; specially, the show-bread as exposed before God.

str2: From energes; to be active, efficient.
